body:
Comment 1: 
how about we apply the following patch:
diff -r 41702da0dcc4 doc/style.css
--- a/doc/style.css	Thu May 30 03:03:52 2013 +0800
+++ b/doc/style.css	Thu May 30 04:38:55 2013 +0800
@@ -411,6 +411,7 @@
 	position: relative;
 	top: -40px;
 	margin-bottom: -120px;
+	z-index: -2;
 }
 h2 { clear: right; }
 

so that the image is placed under the text?
_Labels changed: added **priority-later**, removed **priority-triage**._
